attributes.action: social tenants under CALICO are living with damp and mould homes this needs to stop
attributes.additional_details: We are wanting the government to listen to us please, we are social housing tenants and our homes are full of damp mould we live in Burnley... We are getting no help or understanding from Calico....and our council arent doing any thing quick enough to sort out or houses..we have children and we are ill our children are ill ....Due to all the damp and cold and mouldy homes we live in ..please see our facebook group ...and your understand no one should have to live like this please HELP.....http://www.facebook.com/groups/235957439919104/
